assignments.description: Creates an Email Message to attach to the Project Contact and Project record
assignments.name: EmailOneProjectContact_Project
assignments.label: EmailProjectContact+Project

decisions.description: Decides which product the record is for and which reminder email to send (day before or after migration/upgrade follow up)
decisions.name: ReminderEmailProductDecision
decisions.label: ReminderEmailProductDecision

decisions.description: Decides if the NI Doc has a scheduled upgrade date in the Migration Date field or if the upgrade has been marked as complete.
decisions.name: UpgradeScheduleOrComplete
decisions.label: UpgradeScheduleOrComplete

rules.name: UpgradeScheduledC1
rules.conditionLogic: 1 and 2 and 3 and 8 and ((4 and 5) or (4 and 6 and 7))
rules.label: UpgradeScheduledC1

rules.name: UpgradeCompleteC1
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND ((3 and 4) or (3 and 5 and 6))
rules.label: UpgradeCompleteC1

recordCreates.description: Creates additional email message to relate the email just sent to the Project Contact and the Project
recordCreates.name: CreateEmailMessages
recordCreates.label: CreateEmailMessages

recordUpdates.description: Updates the "BE4 Upgrade Complete Date" to the current date
recordUpdates.name: UpdateCompleteDate
recordUpdates.label: UpdateCompleteDate

textTemplates.name: template1H_BEUpgradeScheduled
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!$Record.Account__r.Name},

 

Congratulations on your upcoming upgrade to the iHotelier New Booking Engine! We look forward to partnering with you to upgrade your existing Booking Engine to this new solution. 

Your New Booking Engine upgrade is scheduled for {!$Record.AH_PLCM_Migration_Date__c}. Once the configuration steps have been completed, we will let you know by email that your Booking Engine is ready for review. If everything meets your satisfaction, you'll be ready to publish and begin using your New Booking Engine! 

 

IMPORTANT: If you are not an Amadeus Web Solutions customer with a Vanity URL, you will need to complete the following steps before publishing the New Booking Engine. 

 

Configuring Vanity URL Settings: https://training.travelclick.com/help/IH_Online_Help/Default_CSH.htm#200900 

 

To learn more about these upgrades and how to use this next-level booking engine, please reference the following resources below:  

  • Click here to view a recording from customer training  
  • Click here to view the presentation slides from customer training  
  • Click here to view a detailed FAQ of iHotelier’s New Booking Engine   
  • Online Help Resources 

We very much appreciate your choice to partner with Amadeus as we shape the future of travel together. We look forward to working with you to ensure that the Amadeus iHotelier New Booking Engine meets your business needs. 

  

Thank you,  

 

Upgrade Team 

Platform Life Cycle Management 

Hospitality 

75 New Hampshire Avenue 

Portsmouth, New Hampshire 03801 

United States 

www.amadeus-hospitality.com 


﻿Email Ref ID: {!$Record.Email_Ref_Id__c}

textTemplates.name: template1L_BEUpgradeScheduled
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!$Record.Account__r.Name},

 

Congratulations on your upcoming upgrade to the iHotelier New Booking Engine! We look forward to partnering with you to upgrade your existing Booking Engine to this new solution. 

Your New Booking Engine upgrade is scheduled for {!$Record.AH_PLCM_Migration_Date__c}. Once this upgrade has been completed, we will publish the New Booking Engine and you can begin working with it. We will let you know by email that the upgrade was successful and that the New Booking Engine has been published. 

 

To learn more about these upgrades and how to use this next-level booking engine, please reference the following resources below: 

 

  • Click here to view a recording from customer training 
  • Click here to view the presentation slides from customer training 
  • Click here to view a detailed FAQ of iHotelier’s New Booking Engine  
  • Online Help Resources 

 

We very much appreciate your choice to partner with Amadeus as we shape the future of travel together. We look forward to working with you to ensure that the Amadeus iHotelier New Booking Engine meets your business needs. 

  

Thank you,  

 

Upgrade Team

Hospitality

Portsmouth, New Hampshire 03801 

United States 

www.amadeus-hospitality.com

textTemplates.name: template2H_BE1DayReminder
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!$Record.Account__r.Name}, 

 

Congratulations on your upcoming upgrade to the iHotelier New Booking Engine! We look forward to partnering with you to upgrade your existing Booking Engine to this new solution. 


Your New Booking Engine upgrade configuration is scheduled for tomorrow! Once the configuration steps have been completed, we will let you know by email that your Booking Engine is ready for review. If everything meets your satisfaction, you'll be ready to publish and begin using your New Booking Engine! 

 

IMPORTANT: If you are not an Amadeus Web Solutions customer with a Vanity URL, you will need to complete the following steps before publishing the New Booking Engine. 

 

Configuring Vanity URL Settings: https://training.travelclick.com/help/IH_Online_Help/Default_CSH.htm#200900 

 

To learn more about these upgrades and how to use this next-level booking engine, please reference the following resources below: 

 

  • Click here to view a recording from customer training 
  • Click here to view the presentation slides from customer training 
  • Click here to view a detailed FAQ of iHotelier’s New Booking Engine 
  • Online Help Resources 

  

We very much appreciate your choice to partner with Amadeus as we shape the future of travel together. We look forward to working with you to ensure that the Amadeus iHotelier New Booking Engine meets your business needs. 

  

Thank you, 

 

Upgrade Team

textTemplates.name: template3H_BEUpgradeComplete
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!$Record.Account__r.Name}, 

 

We are pleased to inform you that we have completed your New Booking Engine upgrade. Please review your New Booking Engine and if you are satisfied with the results, then please proceed to publish your New Booking Engine. Once published, please inform your Account Manager or Customer Success Manager that this has been completed. Also, you have any questions, please feel free to reach out to your Account Manager or Customer Success Manager. 

 

IMPORTANT: If you are not an Amadeus Web Solutions customer with a Vanity URL, you will need to complete the following steps before publishing the New Booking Engine. 

 

Configuring Vanity URL Settings: https://training.travelclick.com/help/IH_Online_Help/Default_CSH.htm#200900 

 

To learn more about these upgrades and how to use this next-level booking engine, please reference the following resources below: 

 

  • Click here to view a recording from customer training 
  • Click here to view the presentation slides from customer training 
  • Click here to view a detailed FAQ of iHotelier’s New Booking Engine 
  • Online Help Resources 

 

NOTE: If you wish to create a Customer Care case for assistance, please include the keywords ‘BE5 Upgrade’ in the subject line of the case. 

 

We very much appreciate your choice to partner with Amadeus, as we shape the future of travel together. We look forward to working with you to ensure that the Amadeus iHotelier New Booking Engine meets your business needs. 

 

Thank you, 

 

Migration Team 

Platform Life Cycle Management 

Hospitality 

75 New Hampshire Avenue 

Portsmouth, New Hampshire 03801 

United States 

www.amadeus-hospitality.com
